headline: T-Mobile US Launches $14 Billion Shareholder Return Program
summary: T Mobile US ( (TMUS) ) has provided an update. T-Mobile US announced a new shareholder return program valued at up to $14 billion, which includes share repurchases and cash dividends, running through the end of 2025. This program is part of a broader capital allocation strategy that anticipates $80 billion in investments and capital returns by 2027. T-Mobile’s strategy reflects a balanced approach to capital management, considering pending transactions and market conditions, with the flexibility

headline: Berkshire Hathaway: Very Unlikely That Buffett Has An Acquisition In Mind For His Large Cash Hoard
summary: Buffett's $325 billion cash position suggests he is preparing for potential market downturns rather than targeting a specific large investment.
